name: Mega Golf (Chirpy)
description:
Mega golf is a 4 player game which allows you to think outside the box and cut corners!
Jump over barriers, curve around corners, walls aren't a problem anymore  :)

//Controls 

- Left click to select/Shoot

- Right click to hit with Wedge (Jump over walls)

- Use the ball at the bottom left to set the curve direction and strength

- Have fun!


The game isn't finished, I don't get enjoyment from working on it anymore. just uploadin' what i did get done

 World 1 and some of World 2 are done  :)
